name: wind power plant construction, 800kW, fixed parts | wind power plant, 800kW, fixed parts | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8405/documentation

Lifetime is assumed to be 40 years. Annual electricity production is assumed to be about 1.4 GWh. Data are from a Nordex N50/800 plant. The foundation (concrete and reinforcing steel) is assumed to be remaining in the ground after the demolition of the power plant.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Includes materials used for fixed parts: tower and base, and their disposal. Also includes the prozessing, the transports needed, and the area that is needed for installation and the energy requirements for the installation itself.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for a specific 800kW wind power plant. Represents European installation conditions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average European technology for a 800 kW wind power plant.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography Europe without Switzerland. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

exchanges.description:
The tower of the plant is made of steel and has a diameter of 2.8 m at the basement and 1.8 m at the upper end (conically shaped). The heigth of the tower is 50 m, treated with a paint surface. The tower has a weight of 70 t. The fundament consists of concrete and reinforcing steel.
EcoSpold01Location=RER

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Estimation. For the tower the most common welding process (MAG-C-process) is assumed. Welding is accounted at a length of 3.8 m height of the tower. The expenses for material consumption are estimated with a weld of 0.166 kg/m and is rounded up generously. A total of 190 m of welding seam in different forms and strenghts are estimated.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=CH
Calculated value. The energy needed for the assembly of the tower can be roughly estimated based on the excavation work. The whole tower mass of 70 t is lifted 25 m (half of the tower height) and also moved horizontally (Epot = 70'000 kg*25 m*10ms-2 = 17.5 MJ = 4.8 kWh). An electricity consumption of 10 kWh is estimated (losses included).
